sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle, } from "./card"; import { Button } from "./button"; import { Badge } from "./badge"; export function RecipeIntegration() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const sampleRecipes = [ { name: "Quinoa Buddha Bowl", difficulty: "Easy", time: "25 min", servings: 2, calories: 420, ingredients: [ { name: "Quinoa", quantity: "1 cup", inPantry: true }, { name: "Sweet potato", quantity: "1 medium", inPantry: false }, { name: "Chickpeas", quantity: "1 can", inPantry: false }, { name: "Kale", quantity: "2 cups", inPantry: false }, { name: "Avocado", quantity: "1", inPantry: false }, ], image: "🥗", tags: ["Vegan", "High Protein", "Budget Friendly"], }, { name: "Mediterranean Salmon", difficulty: "Medium", time: "35 min", servings: 2, calories: 580, ingredients: [ { name: "Salmon fillet", quantity: "2 pieces", inPantry: false }, { name: "Olive oil", quantity: "2 tbsp", inPantry: true }, { name: "Lemon", quantity: "1", inPantry: false }, { name: "Herbs", quantity: "1 bunch", inPantry: false }, { name: "Quinoa", quantity: "1 cup", inPantry: true }, ], image: "🐟", tags: ["High Protein", "Omega-3", "Premium"], }, ]; return (
👨‍🍳 Smart Cooking Mode

Recipe Integration + Smart Ingredient Ordering

Each diet plan generates weekly recipe suggestions with step-by-step instructions. Order missing ingredients with one click and sync with your pantry.

{/* Recipe Cards */}
{sampleRecipes.map((recipe, index) => (
{recipe.name} A delicious and nutritious meal perfect for your diet plan
{recipe.image}
{/* Recipe Meta */}
⏱️ {recipe.time} 👥 {recipe.servings} servings 🔥 {recipe.calories} cal 📊 {recipe.difficulty}
{/* Tags */}
{recipe.tags.map((tag, idx) => ( {tag} ))}
{/* Ingredients List */}

Ingredients

{recipe.ingredients.map((ingredient, idx) => (
{ingredient.name} {ingredient.quantity}
{!ingredient.inPantry && ( )}
))}
{/* Action Buttons */}
))}
{/* Smart Features Showcase */}

🚀 Smart Cooking Features

Our AI-powered cooking assistant makes meal preparation effortless and cost-effective

📱

One-Click Ordering

Order missing ingredients for any recipe with a single tap. AI automatically adds only what you need.

🏠

Pantry Sync

Upload photos of your pantry or input manually. AI suggests recipes using what you already have.

🎯

Diet Optimization

Recipes automatically adjust to your dietary restrictions, allergies, and health goals.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Cooking Smart?

Get personalized recipes, smart ingredient ordering, and save money on groceries

); }
